comment.val: Please note that the installation of third-party add-ons allows them to access and use data stored on your device or local network. This presents a risk when using add-ons from untrusted or unknown sources. We strongly recommend thoroughly researching the publisher of any third-party add-on before installation and only installing add-ons from reputable sources.

key.val: 请注意，您安装的第三方插件包有权访问存储在您的设备或本地网络中的数据。安装来源不明或未受信任的插件包会带来安全风险。 我们强烈建议您，在安装第三方插件包前全面了解发布者信息，只安装那些来源可信的插件包。

key.comment: Tooltip for contentEncoding keyword.

comment.val: A string is valid against this keyword if it is encoded using the method indicated by the keyword value. The value must be a string.

key.val: 如果使用关键字值指示的方法对字符串进行编码，则该字符串对该关键字有效。值必须是字符串。

key.comment: Tooltip for $id keyword.

comment.val: Specifies a unique ID for a document or a document sub-schema. The value must be a string representing a URI.

key.val: 指定文档或文档子架构的唯一ID。该值必须是表示URI的字符串。

key.comment: Tooltip for contentMediaType keyword.

comment.val: A string is valid against this keyword if its content has the media type (MIME type) indicated by the keyword value. If the "contentEncoding" keyword is also specified, the decoded content must have the indicated media type.

key.val: 如果字符串的内容具有关键字值指示的媒体类型（MIME类型），则该字符串对该关键字有效。如果还指定了“contentEncoding”关键字，则解码内容必须具有指定的媒体类型。

key.comment: Tooltip for format keyword.

comment.val: Performs a semantic validation on data. The value must be a string that represents a format.

key.val: 对数据执行语义验证。该值必须是表示格式的字符串。

key.comment: Tooltip for propertyNames keyword.

comment.val: An object is valid against this keyword if every property name (key) is valid against the keyword value.

key.val: 如果每个属性名（key）对关键字值有效，则对象对该关键字有效。

key.comment: Tooltip for $schema keyword.

comment.val: This keyword is used to specify the desired schema version.

key.val: 此关键字用于指定所需的架构版本。

key.comment: Tooltip for $comment keyword.

comment.val: Contains an observation about the schema. The value must be a string.

key.val: 包含对架构的观察。值必须是字符串。

key.comment: Tooltip for writeOnly keyword.

comment.val: Used to mark specific properties as write-only.

key.val: 用于将特定属性标记为仅写。

key.comment: Tooltip for readOnly keyword.

comment.val: Used to mark specific properties as read-only.

key.val: 用于将特定属性标记为只读。

key.comment: Tooltip for const keyword.

comment.val: An instance validates against this keyword if its value equals the value of this keyword. The value can be anything.

key.val: 如果该关键字的值等于该关键字的值，则实例将根据该关键字进行验证。价值可以是任何东西。

key.comment: Tooltip for enum keyword.

comment.val: An instance validates against this keyword if its value can be found in the items defined by the keyword value. The value must be an array that contains anything (an empty array is not allowed).

key.val: 如果可以在关键字值定义的项中找到该关键字的值，则实例将根据该关键字进行验证。该值必须是包含任何内容的数组（不允许使用空数组）。

key.comment: Tooltip for required keyword.

comment.val: An object is valid against this keyword if it contains all property names (keys) specified by the keyword value. The value must be a non-empty array of strings that represent property names.

key.val: 如果对象包含关键字值指定的所有属性名（键），则该对象对该关键字有效。该值必须是表示属性名称的字符串的非空数组。

key.comment: Tooltip for pattern keyword.

comment.val: A string is valid against this keyword if it matches the regular expression specified by the keyword value. The value must be a string that represents a valid regular expression.

key.val: 如果字符串与关键字值指定的正则表达式匹配，则该字符串对该关键字有效。该值必须是表示有效正则表达式的字符串。

key.comment: Tooltip for maxLength keyword.

comment.val: A string is valid against this keyword if its length is lower than or equal to the keyword value. The value must be a non-negative integer.

key.val: 如果字符串长度小于或等于关键字值，则该字符串对该关键字有效。该值必须是非负整数。

key.comment: Tooltip for minLength keyword.

comment.val: A string is valid against this keyword if its length is greater than or equal to the keyword value. The value must be a non-negative integer.

key.val: 如果字符串长度大于或等于关键字值，则该字符串对该关键字有效。该值必须是非负整数。

key.comment: Tooltip for type keyword.

comment.val: Specifies the type of data that the schema is expecting to validate. This keyword is not mandatory and the value must be a string representing a valid data type, or an array of strings representing a valid list of data types.

key.val: 指定架构希望验证的数据类型。此关键字不是必需的，并且该值必须是表示有效数据类型的字符串，或者是表示有效数据类型列表的字符串数组。

key.comment: Tooltip for $ref keyword.

comment.val: An instance is valid against this keyword if it is valid against the schema that points to the location indicated by the keyword value. The value must be a string representing a URI, URI reference, URI template, or JSON pointer.

key.val: 如果实例对指向关键字值所指示位置的架构有效，则该实例对该关键字有效。该值必须是表示URI、URI引用、URI模板或JSON指针的字符串。

key.comment: Tooltip for minItems keyword.

comment.val: An array is valid against this keyword if the number of items it contains is greater than or equal to the keyword value. The value must be a non-negative integer.

key.val: 如果数组包含的项数大于或等于关键字值，则该数组对该关键字有效。该值必须是非负整数。

key.comment: Tooltip for maxItems keyword.

comment.val: An array is valid against this keyword if the number of items it contains is lower than or equal to the keyword value. The value must be a non-negative integer.

key.val: 如果数组包含的项数小于或等于关键字值，则该数组对该关键字有效。该值必须是非负整数。

key.comment: Tooltip for uniqueItems keyword.

comment.val: An array is valid against this keyword if an item cannot be found more than once in the array. The value must be boolean. If set to false, the keyword validation will be ignored.

key.val: 如果在数组中不能多次找到某个项，则该数组对该关键字有效。该值必须是布尔值。如果设置为false，将忽略关键字验证。

key.comment: Tooltip for additionalItems keyword.

comment.val: An array is valid against this keyword if all its unchecked items are valid against the schema defined by the keyword value.

key.val: 如果数组的所有未选中项都对关键字值定义的架构有效，则该数组对该关键字有效。

key.comment: Tooltip for minProperties keyword.

comment.val: An object is valid against this keyword if the number of properties it contains is greater than or equal to the keyword value. The value of this keyword must be a non-negative integer. Using 0 as a value has no effect.

key.val: 如果对象包含的属性数大于或等于关键字值，则对象对该关键字有效。 此关键字的值必须是一个非负整数。 使用 0 作为值无效。

key.comment: Tooltip for maxProperties keyword.

comment.val: An object is valid against this keyword if the number of properties it contains is lower than or equal to the keyword value. The value must be a non-negative integer. Using 0 as a value means that the object must be empty (no properties).

key.val: 如果对象包含的属性数小于或等于关键字值，则对象对该关键字有效。 该值必须是一个非负整数。 使用 0 作为值意味着对象必须为空（无属性）。

key.comment: Tooltip for additionalProperties keyword.

comment.val: An object is valid against this keyword if all its unchecked properties are valid against the schema defined by the keyword value. Unchecked properties are the properties not checked by the "properties" and "patternProperties" keywords.

key.val: 如果对象的所有未选中属性对关键字值定义的架构有效，则该对象对该关键字有效。未选中的属性是“properties”和“patternProperties”关键字未选中的属性。

key.comment: Tooltip for patternProperties keyword.

comment.val: An object is valid against this keyword if every property where a property name (key) matches a regular expression from its value and is also valid against the corresponding schema.

key.val: 如果属性名称（key）从其值匹配正则表达式的每个属性，并且对相应的架构也有效，则对象对该关键字有效。

key.comment: Tooltip for minimum keyword.

comment.val: A number is valid against this keyword if it is greater than or equal to the keyword value. The value must be a number (integer or float).

key.val: 如果一个数字大于或等于该关键字的值，则该数字对该关键字有效。 该值必须是一个数字（整数或浮点数）。

key.comment: Tooltip for maximum keyword.

comment.val: A number is valid against this keyword if it is lower than or equal to the keyword value. The value must be a number (integer or float).

key.val: 如果一个数字小于或等于关键字值，则该数字对这个关键字有效。 该值必须是一个数字（整数或浮点数）。

key.comment: Tooltip for exclusiveMinimum keyword.

comment.val: A number is valid against this keyword if it is strictly greater than the keyword value. The value must be a number (integer or float) or boolean.

key.val: 如果一个数字严格大于关键字值，则该数字对这个关键字有效。 该值必须是一个数字（整数或浮点数）或布尔值。

key.comment: Tooltip for exclusiveMaximum keyword.

comment.val: A number is valid against this keyword if it is strictly lower than the keyword value. The value must be a number (integer or float) or boolean.

key.val: 如果一个数字严格小于关键字值，则该数字对这个关键字有效。 该值必须是一个数字（整数或浮点数）或布尔值。

key.comment: Tooltip for multipleOf keyword.

comment.val: A number is valid against this keyword if the division between the number and its value results in an integer. The value must be a strictly positive number (zero is not allowed).

key.val: 如果数字能被其值整除，则该数字是有效的。且该值必须是正整数（不允许为零）。

comment.val:
If the "{0}" option is selected, only the files that match all of the search terms are displayed. Otherwise, all files that match at least one of the search terms are displayed.
If wildcards are used (*, ?), the option is automatically disabled.

If the "{1}" option is selected, the search is expanded to include the paths.

key.val:
如果选择了"{0}" 选项，则只显示与所有搜索项匹配的文件。否则，将显示至少与一个搜索关键词匹配的所有文件。
如果使用通配符使用（*，？），该选项将自动禁用。

如果选择了"{1}"选项，搜索指定路径下的内容。

key.comment: Message shown to describe limitations for opening large documents.

comment.val:
Optimizes memory usage when loading large local files in the Text page, by using temporary file buffers.

 To open a large file from the disk using this optimization, you need an amount of memory for Oxygen 3-6 times (depending on the XML structure) larger than the size of the file on disk, plus an additional 30-40MB.
 You also need to have enough disk space for the temporary file buffer available in your temporary directory.
 Example: At best, you can load a file of 200 MB on disk in Oxygen using a minimum of 512 MB and having an amount of 400 MB free disk space.

 The following changes take place:
 1) The imposed initial page for opening large documents is the Text page.
 2) The automatic validation is disabled.
 3) XPath expressions cannot be used in the Find/Replace dialog for filtering.
 4) There is no support for special rendering of bidirectional documents.
 5) If the 'Format and indent the document on open' option is enabled, the formatting will be disabled for non-XML documents.
 For XML documents, it will be done optimizing the memory usage, but without respecting the options set in the Oxygen 'Editor/Format' preferences page.
 6) The localization for executed XPath expressions is less precise.
 The execution of XPath expressions uses SAX sources for a smaller memory footprint. We recommend using XPath 2.0, which has increased speed and a smaller memory footprint than 1.0. XPath 2.0 requires additional memory, about 2-3 times the size of the document on the disk.

key.val:
通过使用临时文件缓冲区优化在文本页加载大型本地文件时的内存使用情况。

 要使用此优化从磁盘打开大型文件，您需要比磁盘上的文件大小大3-6倍（取决于XML结构）的内存，再加上一个30-40MB的空间。
 您还需要有足够的磁盘空间用于临时目录中的临时文件缓冲区。
 示例：您可以使用最少512 MB的空间和400 MB的可用磁盘空间将最多200 MB的文件加载到Oxygen磁盘上。

 将发生以下更改：1）用于打开大型文档的强制初始页是文本页。
 2）禁用自动验证。
 3）XPath表达式无法在“查找/替换”对话框中用于筛选。
 4）不支持双向文档的特殊呈现。
 5）如果启用“打开时格式化并缩进文档”选项，则将禁用非XML文档的格式设置。
对于XML文档，将优化内存使用情况，但不考虑Oxygen“Editor/格式”首选项页中设置的选项。
 6）执行的XPath表达式的本地化不太精确。
 XPath表达式的执行使用SAX源以减少内存占用。我们建议使用XPath 2.0，它比1.0速度更快，内存占用更小。XPath 2.0需要额外的内存，大约是磁盘上文档大小的2-3倍。

key.comment: Message shown to describe limitations for opening documents containing long lines.

comment.val:
The documents containing long lines can affect the performance when opened in the text editor. If you choose to open such documents, the line wrap support will be enabled. Also some of the features of the editor will be affected:
 1) The 'Monospaced' font is used as the editor's font.
 2) The automatic validation is disabled.
 3) The automatic spell checking is disabled.
 4) XPath expressions cannot be used in the Find/Replace dialog for filtering.
 5) The localization for executed XPath expressions is less precise.
 The XPath executions use SAX sources for smaller memory footprint. We recommend using XPath 2.0, which has increased speed and a smaller memory footprint than 1.0. XPath 2.0 requires additional memory, about 2-3 times the size of the document on disk.

key.val:
当在文本Editor中打开时，包含长行的文档可能会影响性能。 如果选择打开此类文档，则将启用换行支持。Editor的某些功能也将受到影响：:
 1）使用“等宽”字体作为Editor的字体。
 2）禁用自动验证。
 3）禁用自动拼写检查:
 4）在“查找/替换”对话框中不能使用XPath表达式进行筛选。:
 5）执行的XPath表达式的本地化不太精确。
 XPath执行使用SAX源以减少内存占用。我们建议使用XPath 2.0，它比1.0速度更快，内存占用更小。XPath 2.0需要额外的内存，大约是磁盘上文档大小的2-3倍。

key.comment: Message in the Version Checker dialog. The 1st parameter represents the HTML start tag for bold text; it should be simply ignored; see also the NOTE below. The 2nd parameter represents the name of the product/application (e.g. "Oxygen XML Author", or "Oxygen Content Fusion", and so on). The 3rd parameter represents the HTML tag for "no-breaking-space"; it should be also ignored; see the NOTE below. The 4th parameter represents the product/application version ID (e.g. "19" or "19.1, and so on"). The 5th parameter represents the HTML end tag for bold text; it should be ignored, too; see the NOTE below. XHTML - HREF tooltip.

comment.val:
Specifies the hyperlink target for the 'area' element.
 Possible values:
 
 - An absolute URL - points to another web site (like href="http://www.example.com/sun.htm")
 - A relative URL - points to a file within a web site (like href="sun.htm")
 - Link to an element with a specified id within the page (like href="#top")
 - Other protocols (like https://, ftp://, mailto:, file:, etc..)
 - A script (like href="javascript:alert('Hello');")

key.val:
指定“area”元素的超链接目标。
可能的值为：\ n
-绝对URL-指向另一个网站（如：href=“http://www.example.com/sun.htm”）
-相对URL-指向网站中的文件（如：href=“sun.htm”）
-指向具有指定页面内的id（如：http://、ftp://、mailto:、file:，等等）n-其他协议（如：https://、ftp://、mailto:、file:，等等）n-脚本（如：href=“javascript:alert（'Hello'）;”）

key.comment: XHTML - Alternate tooltip.

comment.val: The description of the 'area' element.\n This is a required attribute to present a text alternative for browsers that do not display images.

key.val: 'area'元素的描述。\n这是为不显示图像的浏览器提供文本替代的必需属性。

key.comment: XHTML - Target tooltip.

comment.val:
Specifies where to open the linked document.
 The allowed values are: _blank | _self | _parent | _top | framename.

 _blank - Opens the linked document in a new window or tab
 _self - Opens the linked document in the same frame as it was clicked
 _parent - Opens the linked document in the parent frame
 _top - Opens the linked document in the full body of the window
 framename - Opens the linked document in a named frame

key.val:
指定打开链接文档的位置。
允许的值为：_blank |_self |_parent |_top | framename。

 _blank-在新窗口或选项卡中打开链接文档
 _self-在单击链接文档时在同一框架中打开它

comment.val:
Do you want to enable support for bidirectional text, Asian languages, and special characters? 

The document "{0}" contains bidirectional text (such as Arabic or Hebrew), South/South-Eastern Asian text, or special characters (such as combining characters) that require special handling to ensure proper editing.
 Disabling this support affects text rendering, cursor positioning and navigation, as well as text selection and management operations. 

{1}Note:{2} Application performance may be affected when this support is enabled.

key.val:
是否要启用对双向文本、亚洲语言和特殊字符的支持？

文档“{0}”包含双向文本（如阿拉伯语或希伯来语）、东南亚文本或特殊字符（如组合字符），这些字符需要特殊处理才能确保正确编辑。
禁用此支持会影响文本呈现、光标定位和导航，以及文本选择和管理操作。

{1}注意：{2}启用此支持时，应用程序性能可能会受到影响。

Additional information for option:Prefer DTD comments that start with 'doc:' as annotations

comment.val:
To address the lack of dedicated annotation support in DTD documents, Oxygen recommends prefixing with the "doc:" particle all comments intended to be shown to the developer who writes an XML validated against a DTD schema.

 When this option is enabled, Oxygen uses the following mechanism to collect annotations:
 - if at least one "doc:" comment is found in the entire DTD, only comments of this type are displayed as annotations
 - if no "doc:" comment is found in the entire DTD, all comments are considered annotations and displayed as such

 When the option is disabled, all comments, regardless of their type, are considered annotations and displayed as such.

key.val:
为了解决DTD文档中缺少专用注释支持，Oxygen 建议用“doc：”粒子进行前缀，所有注释都要显示给开发人员，该开发人员编写了一个针对DTD模式验证的XML。 启用此选项时，Oxygen 使用以下机制收集注释： -如果在整个DTD中至少找到一个“doc:”注释，则只有此类型的注释显示为注释
 -如果在整个DTD中找不到“doc:”注释，则所有注释都将被视为注释并显示为注释

 禁用该选项时，所有注释（无论其类型如何）都将被视为批注并按批注显示。

key.val: 两个源URL必须指向同一个存储库。

key.comment: SVN: error message if merge source is not from the same repository as the destination

comment.val: Merge source URL must point to the same repository as the merge target.

key.val: 合并源URL必须指向与合并目标相同的存储库。

key.comment: SVN option name, used to not register/track the revisions merged from one branch to another

comment.val: Multiple single revisions and/or revision ranges can be specified and mixing of forward and reverse ranges is allowed.

key.val: 可以指定多个单个修订和/或修订范围，并允许向前和反向范围的混合。

key.comment: Option in the SVN merge wizard dialog box
Option in the SVN merge wizard dialog box
SVN merge: merge two different trees option short description

comment.val: Merge the difference between two source URLs at specific revisions.

key.val: 合并特定修订版中两个源URL之间的差异。

key.comment: SVN merge: merge two different trees option description

comment.val: The two sources are compared at the specified revisions, and the difference is applied to another branch. The three branches involved can be completely unrelated.\n\n You should use this merge variant only if the other variants do not apply to your situation.

key.val: 这两个源在指定的修订处进行比较，差异将应用于另一个分支。涉及的三个分支可能完全不相关。\n\n只有当其他变量不适用于您的情况时，才应使用此合并变量。

key.comment: SVN merge: reintegrate branch option short description

comment.val: Merge back a branch to its originating branch.

key.val: 将分支合并回其原始分支。

key.comment: SVN merge: reintegrate branch option description

comment.val: The source branch has originally been created by copying the target branch, development has concluded on the source branch and it should now be merged back into the target branch.

key.val: 源分支最初是通过复制目标分支创建的，开发已经在源分支上结束，现在应该将其合并回目标分支。

key.comment: SVN merge: synchronize branch option short description

comment.val: Fetch all the latest changes made on a parent branch.

key.val: 获取在父分支上所做的所有最新更改。

key.comment: SVN merge: synchronize branch option description

comment.val: The target branch has originally been created by copying a source branch, and any changes committed on the source branch, since branching, are applied to the target branch.\n\n You should synchronize your branch periodically to stay up-to-date with the source branch.

key.val: 目标分支最初是通过复制源分支创建的，自分支以来在源分支上提交的任何更改都将应用于目标分支。\n\n应定期同步分支，以与源分支保持最新。

key.comment: SVN merge: merge revisions option short description

comment.val: Merge specific revisions (or revision ranges) from one branch to another.

key.val: 将特定修订（或修订范围）从一个分支合并到另一个分支。

key.comment: SVN merge: merge revisions option description

comment.val: Changes done between different revisions of the source branch are merged to the target branch.

key.val: 源分支的不同修订之间所做的更改将合并到目标分支。

Join and normalize lines action
Description of the Step Into action.

comment.val: Run until the next instruction is encountered.

key.val: 运行直到遇到下一条指令。

key.comment: Description of the Step Over action.

comment.val: Run until the current instruction and its sub-instructions are over. Usually, this will advance to the next sibling instruction.

key.val: 运行直到当前指令及其子指令结束。通常，这将前进到下一个兄弟指令。

key.comment: Description of the Step Out action.

comment.val: Run until the parent of the current instruction is over. Usually, this will advance to the next sibling of the parent instruction.

key.val: 运行，直到当前指令的父级结束。通常，这将前进到父指令的下一个同级。

key.comment: Description of the Run action.

comment.val: Run until a breakpoint is encountered, or the transformation ends.

key.val: 运行，直到遇到断点或转换结束。

key.comment: Description of the Run to cursor action.

comment.val: Run until the current line is reached, a breakpoint is hit, or the execution ends.

key.val: 运行，直到到达当前行、遇到断点或执行结束。

key.comment: Description of the Run to end action.

comment.val: Run the transformation until the end, without taking into account enabled breakpoints (if any).

key.val: 运行转换直到结束，不考虑启用的断点（如果有的话）。

key.comment: Description of the Pause action.

comment.val: Request to pause the current transformation as soon as possible.

key.val: 请求尽快暂停当前转换。

key.comment: Description of the Stop action.

comment.val: Request to stop the current transformation without completing its execution.

key.val: 请求停止当前转换而不完成其执行。

key.comment: Description of the Show current execution nodes action.

comment.val: Reveals the current debugger context, showing both the current instruction and the current node in the XML source.

key.val: 显示当前调试器上下文，同时显示XML源中的当前指令和当前节点。

Used as a checkbox label to enable/disable the support that adds default attribute values by looking into a RELAX NG schema for default value annotations. key.comment: Generic unhandled exception error message

comment.val: The application detected an error that is not automatically handled. It is possible that this error is not critical and the application may continue to work normally but our recommendation is to report the error and restart the application. comment.val: Command line arguments used to validate the current edited file against a Schematron Schema. The arguments can include any custom switch (like -sch) and two editor variables ${cf} representing the place where the current file path will be inserted and ${ds} where Schematron Schema file path will be inserted. For example ${cf} --sch ${ds} will validate the current edited file against the given schema. The editor variables are replaced at runtime with the detected references.

key.val: 用于根据Schematron架构验证当前编辑的文件的命令行参数。 参数可以包括任何自定义开关（如-sch）和两个Editor变量${cf}，表示将插入当前文件路径的位置，以及${ds}表示将插入Schematron架构文件路径的位置。例如${cf}--sch${ds}将根据给定架构验证当前编辑的文件。Editor变量在运行时被检测到的引用替换。

key.comment: Pluggable Error Scanner NVDL arguments explain.

comment.val: Command line arguments used to validate the current edited file against a NVDL Schema. The arguments can include any custom switch (like -nvdl) and two editor variables ${cf} representing the place where the current file path will be inserted and ${ds} where NVDL Schema file path will be inserted. For example ${cf} --nvdl ${ds} will validate the current edited file against the given schema. The editor variables are replaced at runtime with the detected references.

key.val: 命令行参数，用于根据NVDL架构验证当前编辑的文件。参数可以包括任何自定义开关（如-nvdl）和两个Editor变量${cf}，它们表示将插入当前文件路径的位置，以及${ds}表示将插入nvdl架构文件路径的位置。例如${cf}--nvdl${ds}将根据给定架构验证当前编辑的文件。Editor变量在运行时被检测到的引用替换。

key.comment: Pluggable Error Scanner RNC arguments explain.

comment.val: Command line arguments used to validate the current edited file against a RELAX NG Schema (compact format). The arguments can include any custom switch (like -rnc) and two editor variables ${cf} representing the place where the path of current file will be inserted and ${ds} where the path of RELAX NG Schema file will be inserted. For example ${cf} --rnc ${ds} will validate the current edited file against the given schema. The editor variables are replaced at runtime with the detected references.

key.val: 用于根据RELAX NG架构（压缩格式）验证当前编辑的文件的命令行参数。参数可以包括任何自定义开关（如-rnc）和两个Editor变量${cf}，它们表示将插入当前文件路径的位置，以及${ds}表示将插入RELAX NG架构文件路径的位置。例如${cf}--rnc${ds}将根据给定的架构验证当前编辑的文件。Editor变量在运行时被检测到的引用替换。

key.comment: Pluggable Error Scanner RNG arguments explain.

comment.val: Command line arguments used to validate the current edited file against a RELAX NG Schema (XML format). The arguments can include any custom switch (like -rng) and two editor variables ${cf} representing the place where the path of current file will be inserted and ${ds} where the path of RELAX NG Schema file will be inserted. For example ${cf} --rng ${ds} will validate the current edited file against the given schema. The editor variables are replaced at runtime with the detected references.

key.val: 命令行参数，用于根据RELAX NG架构（XML格式）验证当前编辑的文件。参数可以包括任何自定义开关（如-rng）和两个Editor变量${cf}，它们表示将插入当前文件路径的位置，以及${ds}表示将插入RELAX NG架构文件路径的位置。例如${cf}--rng${ds}将根据给定架构验证当前编辑的文件。Editor变量在运行时被检测到的引用替换。

key.comment: Pluggable Error Scanner XSD arguments explain.

comment.val: Command line arguments used to validate the current edited file against a W3C Schema. The arguments can include any custom switch (like -w3cschema) and two editor variables ${cf} representing the place where path of the current file will be inserted and ${ds} where the path of W3C Schema file reference will be inserted. For example ${cf} --w3cschema ${ds} will validate the current edited file against the given schema. The editor variables are replaced at runtime with the detected references.

key.val: 用于根据W3C架构验证当前编辑的文件的命令行参数。参数可以包括任何自定义开关（如-W3C Schema）和两个Editor变量${cf}，它们表示将插入当前文件路径的位置，以及${ds}表示将插入W3C架构文件引用路径的位置。例如${cf}--w3cschema${ds}将根据给定架构验证当前编辑的文件。Editor变量在运行时被检测到的引用替换。

key.comment: Pluggable Error Scanner DTD arguments explain.

comment.val: Command line arguments used to validate the current edited file against a DTD. The arguments can include any custom switch (like -dtd) and two editor variables ${cf} representing the place where path of current file will be inserted and ${ds} where the path of dtd file will be inserted. For example ${cf} --dtd ${ds} will validate the current edited file against the given dtd. The editor variables are replaced at runtime with the detected references.

key.val: 用于根据DTD验证当前编辑的文件的命令行参数。参数可以包括任何自定义开关（如-dtd）和两个Editor变量${cf}，它们表示将插入当前文件路径的位置，以及${ds}表示将插入dtd文件路径的位置。例如${cf}--dtd${ds}将根据给定的dtd验证当前编辑的文件。Editor变量在运行时被检测到的引用替换。

key.comment: XML generator

comment.val: Option to generate the other possible choices or substitutions (for xs:choice and substitutionGroup). These alternatives will be generated inside comments groups so you can uncomment them and use later. Use this option with care (for example on a restricted namespace and element) as it may generate large result files.

key.val: 选项来生成其他可能的选项或替换（对于xs:choice和substitutionGroup）。这些备选方案将在注释组中生成，因此您可以取消注释，以后再使用。小心使用此选项（例如在受限制的命名空间和元素上），因为它可能会生成大型结果文件。

key.comment: XML generator

comment.val:
Option to be used in case of xs:choice or substitutionGroup. The possible strategies are:
 First - the first branch of xs:choice or the head element of substitutionGroup will be always used.
 Random - a random branch of xs:choice or a substitute element or the head element of a substitutionGroup will be used.

key.val: 在xs:choice或substitutionGroup的情况下使用的选项。可能的策略是：\ n 首先-始终使用xs:choice的第一个分支或substitutionGroup的head元素。\n 随机-将使用xs:choice的随机分支或substitutionGroup的substitute元素或head元素。\n

key.comment: XML generator

comment.val: Option to set the maximum allowed depth of the same element in case of recursivity.

key.val: 选项设置相同元素的最大允许深度在递归性的情况下。

key.comment: XML generator

comment.val:
Option to set the preferred number of repeating elements related with minOccurs and maxOccurs defined in XML Schema.
 If the value set here is between minOccurs and maxOccurs, that value will be used.
 If the value set here is less than minOccurs, the minOccurs value will be used.
 If the value set here is greater than maxOccurs, that value will be used.

key.val:
选项设置与XML架构中定义的minOccurs和maxOccurs相关的重复元素的首选数目。
 如果此处设置的值介于minOccurs和maxOccurs之间，则将使用该值。
如果此处设置的值小于minOccurs，将使用minOccurs值。
 如果此处设置的值大于maxOccurs，则将使用该值。

key.comment: XML generator

comment.val:
Option to control the content of generated attributes and elements. Several choices are available:
 None - No content is inserted.
 Default - Inserts a default value depending on data type descriptor of the respective element/attribute. The default value can be either the data type name or an incremental name of the attribute or element (according to the global option from the XML instance generator preferences page)
 Random - Inserts a random value depending on data type descriptor of the respective element/attribute.

key.val:
选项来控制生成的属性和元素的内容。有几个选项可供选择：
 无-不插入内容。
 默认-根据相应元素/属性的数据类型描述符插入默认值。默认值可以是属性或元素的数据类型名称或增量名称 （根据XML实例生成器首选项页中的全局选项），
 随机-根据相应元素/属性的数据类型描述符插入随机值。

For instance, if your Oxygen project file and other files and folders are saved on a versioning system (SVN, CVS, Source Safe, etc.) or a shared folder, your team can use the same options/scenarios you have chosen to store in the project file.

key.comment: The message in the preferences dialog that indicated the user preference for handling encoding errors. The user can choose from REPORT, REPLACE and IGNORE.
